text:
"Ya....dua-dua nya sih sebenernya" Jawab [redacted_name] lalu melanjutkan makannya, kali ini dengan santai.
[redacted_name] mendorong piring siomay nya yang belum tersentuh sama sekali ke depan [redacted_name], dari tadi ia hanya melihat [redacted_name] makan jadi mengabaikan siomay miliknya.
"Ya udah ini buat kamu aja aku masih agak kenyang" Ucapnya membuat [redacted_name] menghentikan makannya dan menatapnya,"Beneran?"
"Iya [redacted_name] sipit" Dengan gemas [redacted_name] mencubit kedua pipi tirus [redacted_name] lalu menatap bibir pinknya, ingin sekali rasanya [redacted_name] mencium bibir itu tapi tidak ada nyali untuk melakukan itu.
"Ya udah tapi setengah aja deh, yang setengahnya di makan kamu [redacted_name] Aaaaaa" Perintah [redacted_name] membuka mulutnya yang diikuti oleh [redacted_name].
Akhirnya [redacted_name] memakan siomay milik [redacted_name] setengah dan setengahnya lagi di makan [redacted_name] dengan disuapi si jelmaan kukang itu.
Selesai makan mereka pergi dari kantin dengan [redacted_name] yang menggandeng mesra lengan [redacted_name]. Saat melewati [redacted_name] dkk yang masih betah di kantin [redacted_name] melirik nya sambil tersenyum miring yang membuat [redacted_name] mengeraskan rahangnya.
"Jadi ke Miniso?" Tanya [redacted_name] saat mereka berjalan ke parkiran motor dimana motor Scoopy kesayangan si sipit itu terparkir.
trans:
"Yeah....both are correct indeed" answered [redacted_name] and continued eating, relaxed this time.
[redacted_name] pushed his siomay plate that had not been touched before to the front of [redacted_name], who had only been watching [redacted_name] eating, so ignoring his own siomay.
"Alright, this is just for you, I am still rather full" he said, that made [redacted_name] stop her eating and gazed, "Really?"
"Yeah, narrow eyed [redacted_name]." Excited, [redacted_name] pinched the thin cheeks of [redacted_name] then gazed at her pink lips, [redacted_name] really wanted to kiss those lips but he had no guts to do it.
"Okay, though, but just only half, you eat the other half, [redacted_name] Aaaaaa" ordered [redacted_name], opening her mouth and followed by [redacted_name].
Finally, [redacted_name] ate half of siomay belonging to [redacted_name], and the other half was eaten by {redacted_name] fed by the reincarnated slow loris.
After finished eating they went to the canteen, where [redacted_name] held [redacted_name]'s hand affectionately. When passing [redacted_name] and his friends who still felt at home in the canteen, [redacted_name] winked at him with a smile, that made [redacted_name] clench his jaws.
"Really going to Miniso?" asked [redacted_name] when they were walking to the parking place where narrow-eyed's favorite Scoopy motorcycle was parked.
